title: An Idea To Balance Lucian
body:
I had an idea to attempt to balance Lucian because, let's be real, even with Lucian's recent range nerfs on his Q, he is still pretty OP.  

Anyway my idea was to make the second shot on Lucian's passive a skillshot.  The skillshot could act like an Ezreal Mystic Shot and have on-hit effects, but now instead of just point and click, there is more of a skill oriented part to his passive.

replies.body: Honestly he is one off those champions where is either nerfed and useless or buffed and is super strong. If Riot wanted to, they need to find the middle ground for him. He's having the same situation that he did when he was buffed after his release.
